p: We computed the geographical distribution of suitable climatic and edaphic conditions—or habitat, as defined by these particular dimensions of the niche—for each of the target tree species, following an ensemble procedure ( Araújo & New, 2007) with the BIOMOD 1.1 modelling package ( Thuiller et al., 2009) implemented in R ( R Development Core Team, 2010). We considered both a baseline period (1961–1990) and a future period (2071–2100, hereafter referred to as 2080).
